Html: Hello, I am very new to Prism 5. I am looking at the EventAggregator quickstart application after loading the project into VS2013. I have the following question: If I was to create this same Prism application from scratch, what would be the sequence of steps after creating a new project? It seems part of the Shell class is machine generated. Why? And how do I do this part in my new Prism 5 project?
